data.title: 12 Romantic Hotels in Sardinia for Honeymoon and Romantic Escapes
data.meta_description: Sardinia is an ideal destination for a dream honeymoon andromantic escapes. If you are planning a trip to the island, you have a nice choice of fine hotels, each with its own touch of romance and charm.
data.text:
Sardinia is an ideal destination for a dream honeymoon and a relaxing couple’s holiday. If you are planning a trip to the island as a couple, you have a nice choice of selected hotels, each with its own touch of romance and charm. In this article, we present our favourite hotels for a romantic getaway: Pamper yourself in elegant and stylish surroundings, relax in the wellness oases, enjoy long walks on the beach and, of course, the good food. Prepare to fall in love again!

Hotel Villa del Golfo Lifestyle Resort

Located in Cannigione, in the north-east of Sardinia and close to the famous Emerald Coast, the Hotel Villa del Golfo Lifestyle Resort is a paradise for newlyweds looking for a romantic retreat. The property offers an unparalleled luxury experience with elegantly furnished rooms and suites overlooking the sea. Rooms range from spacious Charming Sea View Rooms to exclusive suites, each with in-room breakfast service and breathtaking sea views. The luxurious suites are completely independent from the main hotel building and offer an oasis of privacy with a private swimming pool and large outdoor areas. For complete relaxation, you can also enjoy the services of the wellness centre and various dining options, including the MiraLuna restaurant, which offers excellent Mediterranean cuisine.

Cascioni Eco Retreat

Cascioni Eco Retreat is the epitome of luxury and romance in northern Sardinia. Situated in the enchanting natural landscape of Arzachena and the Emerald Coast, the hotel offers its guests elegant suites with private pools, divided between the main house and separate bungalows. Attention has been paid to every detail to create a romantic and intimate atmosphere, which you can feel from the moment you arrive in the central building, dedicated to hospitality, and in the restaurant Ulia, which offers Mediterranean cuisine rooted in local traditions. The rooms overlooking the green garden offer pure relaxation. The Cascioni Eco Retreat also offers a wide range of services and activities, including a wellness centre with sauna and relaxing massages, themed excursions to discover nature and the opportunity to take cooking and yoga classes in the hotel garden. A place where luxury meets nature, offering guests an unforgettable experience of relaxation and well-being.

Hotel Su Gologone

Immersed in the nature of the Sardinian hinterland, the Experience Hotel Su Gologone is an oasis of peace, ideal for those looking for something unique. Located in Oliena, surrounded by lush Mediterranean vegetation and not far from the Su Gologone spring, the hotel enchants its guests with a great love of design and art. The rooms and suites, all individually decorated, offer modern comforts and elegant spaces. Some suites are equipped with a hydro-massage bath. Guests have at their disposal a spring water swimming pool, a gym, a wellness centre and a renowned restaurant where they can taste authentic Sardinian flavours.

Hotel Mannois

The Albergo Diffuso Mannois in Orosei, with its rooms, suites and apartments, spread over 5 different buildings, offers a charming and very romantic atmosphere. The suites, some with hydromassage bathtubs and mini-spas, are the ideal choice for a honeymoon. Albergo Diffuso Mannois is just 3 km from Marina di Orosei beach, and the hotel’s beach service and bike hire make it easy to explore the natural beauty of the area. After an eventful day, visit the Locanda Sa Turre on the 4th floor, with a splendid panoramic terrace, to enjoy local delicacies. For complete relaxation, don’t forget to use the hotel’s wellness centre.

Hotel La Bitta

Located on the east coast of the island, the Hotel La Bitta in Arbatax will enchant anyone looking for a romantic getaway, be it for a honeymoon or a well-deserved holiday without children. Located right on the beach, guests can choose from a variety of accommodations, from rooms with garden views or balconies to romantic suites with private hot tubs and ocean views. The resort has a magnificent freshwater pool, a state-of-the-art gym and a wellness centre where you can pamper yourself.

Hotel Corte Bianca

The Corta Bianca Experience Hotel is for adults only, making it perfect for couples looking for a relaxing holiday. It is located in Cardedu, in the south-east of the island, just a short walk from Foddini beach. It has two swimming pools and direct access to the beach through a pine forest. The rooms and suites offer modern comforts and elegant spaces, with some suites featuring a hydro-massage bathtub. Other facilities include a gym, live music and themed evenings.

Hotel Villa Fanny

If you want to organise your romantic holiday in the lively city of Cagliari, the boutique hotel Villa Fanny, close to the Botanical Gardens and the enchanting Orto dei Capuccini, could be the perfect choice. Situated in the heart of the city, surrounded by an enchanting garden, the hotel offers an oasis of peace just a few steps away from the main attractions of the city centre. The hotel’s 19 rooms and suites are characterised by sophisticated elegance and charming details that create a welcoming and romantic atmosphere. Some suites offer private hot tubs and mini spas with Finnish saunas and hammams, perfect for pampering and relaxing during your honeymoon. Enjoy moments of peace and relaxation in the hotel’s garden, while at the spa you can take advantage of beauty treatments and wellness programmes to rejuvenate your body and mind.

Eliantos Hotel & SPA

Close your eyes and imagine your honeymoon in an oasis of peace and comfort among the white sandy beaches of southern Sardinia. This is what a honeymoon at the Eliantos Hotel & SPA in Santa Margherita di Pula looks like. Spread over an area of more than 7000 m2 and surrounded by pine trees, junipers and mastic trees, the hotel guarantees total relaxation and privacy. The rooms, each dedicated to a typical local flower, have large outdoor areas overlooking gardens or private terraces. For an exclusive experience, we recommend the Executive Suite with private pool, ideal for honeymoons and romantic getaways. The hotel also has a SPA, where you can rejuvenate yourself with beauty treatments and wellness programmes after a day at sea. There is also a solarium and herbal tea area where you can relax in the sun and enjoy excellent drinks.

Hotel Le Dune di Piscinas

On the west coast of Sardinia, in the middle of the almost untouched nature of the Costa Verde, the beach hotel Le Dune di Piscinas is located directly on the sea, created from a former ore deposit. We recommend this charming hotel to those who want to experience the authentic and timeless Sardinia: Le Dune Piscinas is a sustainable 5-star hotel that pays careful and respectful attention to the exceptional context in which the structure is located and features a contemporary design that harmonises with it, the external environment and the spectacular nature are the real protagonists here. Relax in the elegant rooms and suites and enjoy the hotel’s excellent cuisine.

Hotel Aquaesinis

On the west coast of the island, in Cabras, Hotel Aquaesinis is a charming hotel, perfect for a holiday of relaxation and discovery. The structure is an expression of authentic Sardinian hospitality and is made up of three buildings restored with care and respect for traditional architecture. The main building, Thermae, offers a relaxing and intimate SPA, ideal for rejuvenation. The Mistras annex is surrounded by a garden with a swimming pool, while the Pontis annex is ideal for moments of relaxation in the shade of Mediterranean essences. With elegant and comfortable rooms and excellent traditional cuisine reinterpreted, Hotel Aquaesinis is the ideal destination for a perfect honeymoon in Sardinia.

Hotel Lucrezia

The charming Hotel Lucrezia is located in Riola Sardo, a town in the province of Oristano on the west coast. In the courtyard of the hotel, surrounded by luxuriant gardens, you will find an almost magical atmosphere, reminiscent of times gone by, when the house was the centre of agricultural activity. The rooms, distributed between the main house and the annex, are an expression of rustic elegance, furnished with antique furniture but equipped with all modern conveniences. The hotel restaurant offers a culinary experience of simple and genuine flavours, where guests can taste local delicacies every day in the garden or under the shelter of the loggia.
